details: Lead end-to-end automation deliverables, guiding and managing a team of 10 QA professionals across multiple release cycles
Drive significant cost and effort savings through strategic automation implementation and optimization
Designed and implemented multiple automation test suites, enhancing test coverage and efficiency
Configured and mapped Tosca Server for remote script execution and centralized test management
Spearhead exploration and adoption of Tosca's agentic capabilities to reduce manual effort and improve team productivity
Serve as primary escalation point, consistently resolving critical blockers to unblock team and maintain delivery momentum
Collaborate with cross-functional stakeholders across US and Indonesia regions to ensure seamless delivery
